title: JUST A BAD MEME :)
body:
HI, since in EUW maybe memes will have copyright penalty i want to say goodbye with this meme
https://imgur.com/lYoabcn
gl hf ;)

replies.body:
Pentagon.
Hexagon.
Octagon.
All your players are gone.
Oh wait...
Poor paragon... never stood a chance...

its not just the eu that will be affected by this all sites look at the strictest polices and mold there rules around that rather than molding there sites depending on where your from mat pat from game theory did a good job at explaining this

> [{quoted}](name=DeathShadow2,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=87cZEGJA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-11-27T12:11:36.854+0000)
>
> its not just the eu 

We all know there are places beyond the EU. Thanks.

> that will be affected

Which will and what do you say it should be affected by?

> by this all sites look

Sites don't look by things. It's not what they do.

> at the strictest polices and mold

I can't imagine a thing that would apply to policies and mold too. What are you talking about?

> there rules around

Way too many of them.

> that rather than molding

What do you mean "that"? What is "that"? What? WHAT????

> there sites

Everywhere, man, everywhere. All over the internet.

> depending on where your from mat

I don't have a from mat. If I had a from mat, I'd probably keep it in a cupboard.

> pat from game

What game has patting as an action?

> theory did a good

Many theories did a lot of good. Science is awesome that was. I'm not sure which theory you're referring to, but if it did just one good, it's not one of the more influencial ones.

> job at explaining this

What does the job pay? Where do I apply? I'm good at explaining things.
ok ill be the first to admit my grammar is atrocious but i think you coulda made some funnier outa context replies

> [{quoted}](name=DeathShadow2,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=87cZEGJA,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2018-11-27T15:49:49.891+0000)
>
> ok ill be the first

At what?

> to admit my grammar

Into an asylum?

> is atrocious but i think

We all think, at least discounting people in coma. It's nothing to brag about.

> you coulda made some

I made some sushi today. Does that count?

> funnier outa

... Compton?

> context replies

No, it doesn't.

> [{quoted}](name=zoliking,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=87cZEGJA,comment-id=0001000000010000,timestamp=2018-11-27T16:02:02.068+0000)
>
> At what?
> 
> Into an asylum?
> 
> We all think, at least discounting people in coma. It's nothing to brag about.
> 
> I made some sushi today. Does that count?
> 
> ... Compton?
> 
> No, it doesn't.

I don't know why you're getting down voted. This post you make is hilarious.

Can you do me next?

Or wood that be too easy?

> [{quoted}](name=OneMustFall,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=87cZEGJA,comment-id=00010000000100000000,timestamp=2018-11-27T19:34:14.970+0000)
>
> I don't know why you're getting down voted. This post you make is hilarious.

I don't understand it either. It's probably not all that funny to most people, but the intention of calling sy out for assaulting their readers with that kind of writing should be clear. My best hypothesis is that the downvoters don't know how to use punctuation either, so they feel it's a personal attack against them.

...really? I get that it could have used some punctuation and editing, but his post wasn't anywhere near as bad as you're making it out to be.

Here's a corrected version for you:

> Its not just the EU that will be affected by this. All sites look at the strictest polices and mold their rules around that, rather than molding their sites depending on where your from. Mat Pat from [Game Theory](https://www.youtube.com/user/MatthewPatrick13/videos) did a good job at explaining this.

> [{quoted}](name=DrCyanide,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=87cZEGJA,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2018-11-27T14:10:57.715+0000)
>
> ...really? I get that it could have used some punctuation and editing, but his post wasn't anywhere near as bad as you're making it out to be.
> 
> Here's a corrected version for you:

So that's what you meant! Cool.

> So that's what you meant! Cool.

What *I* meant? No, *they* meant.

> [{quoted}](name=DrCyanide,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=87cZEGJA,comment-id=00010000000000010000,timestamp=2018-11-27T14:33:31.086+0000)
>
> What *I* meant? No, *they* meant.

Right you are. Sorry.
_Targon... The most complex polygon of Runaterra..._

R.I.P memes. {{sticker:sg-janna}} Memes were what I lived for now what.
ill be ur meme dealer. how much do you want. Ill tell u the price
